Hackaton Seoul A.I.

About Us Projects

Organizers

Group of professionals from different fields meets twice per month in the heart of Seoul to discuss about AI or implement various AI applications.

Martin Kersner

Martin is Machine Learning Engineer with a passion for learning new things and solving interesting problems.

Cinyoung Hur

Medical Data Engineer, currently working at Linewalks, Inc.

Adel Sohbi

Adel is a researcher in Quantum Information with an interest in Machine Learning.

Featured Projects

Details

It is recommended to think about project you want to work on in advance. You can continue working on some of your projects. You can learn new framework that could be useful for you later on. Or maybe you want implement some new NN architecture? Great! There are no limits to projects, however, the project should be related to Artificial Intelligence.

    PROGRAM:
  • 14:00 - 14:15 Networking
  • 14:15 - 15:15 ICML 2018 Highlights (Chan Y. Park (박찬연))
  • 15:15 - 16:00 Deep Learning Visual Sensor Device for Industrial Applications (Jerry Byungik Ahn)

How to join us

Seoul AI Hackathon allows you to participate either as a single participant or in a team. In case you want to participate in a team, all members (not more than 2 is recommended) have to RSVP to this event through meetup.com. If you want to search for potential team members, the best way is through our slack.
Before joining slack you have to ask for invitation at this page.
